scripts.sls-offline-dev: nodemon --watch src --exec _X_AMZN_TRACE_ID="Root=mock" NODE_ENV=dev sls offline --stage dev
scripts.seed-dev: SLS_DEBUG=* sls dynamodb --stage dev seed --seed=DemoTable --online --region us-east-2
scripts.seed-local: SLS_DEBUG=* sls dynamodb --stage local seed --seed=DemoTable --region us-east-2
scripts.migrate-local: SLS_DEBUG=* sls dynamodb --stage local migrate --region us-east-2
scripts.migrate-dev: SLS_DEBUG=* sls dynamodb --stage dev migrate --online --region us-east-2
